analysis: The current project has a basic structure for a black hole-themed website with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript files. The theme should focus on cosmic visuals, dark backgrounds, and animations related to black holes. The CSS file needs to be completed with a full dark, cosmic theme, including animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. The HTML file should include a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon. The JavaScript file needs to be fixed for syntax errors and completed to ensure all functions are properly implemented.

improvements.description: Complete the CSS file with a full dark, cosmic theme including animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements.
